name: QuizShow
0:
”Alexa, open Quiz Show”
”Alexa, start Quiz Show”
”Alexa, launch Quiz Show”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quiz show
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Quiz Show" is a skill game suitable for everyone, it is a quiz divided into levels. To advance to the next level, the user must answer at least 5 out of 10 questions well. If not, he or she must start over from the first level. To win, it is necessary to complete all levels in one session. Users are asked all kinds of questions and must answer correctly with "yes" or "no".
The multiplayer mode supports up to four players.
